metadata.title: CVE-2021-30578 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Uninitialized use in Media in Google Chrome prior to 92.0.4515.107 alloweda remote attacker to perform out of bounds memory access via a crafted HTMLpage.

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
